author: KeenHaze
text: Product came within two weeks. Everything was authentic and it was a hassle free transaction. Would buy from stockx again
title: Product came within two weeks

author: Kourtney
text: Great experience! Super quick and my son is OBSESSED with his space jam crocs…did not disappoint!
title: Great experience

author: Kamilla
text:
Good quality, original! Perfect price! 
Very fast delivery! Thank you

author: Daniel
text: Shipped very fast, product was authenticated and tracked the whole way with lots of updates. Will deffinatley use again.(was skeptical at first) now a very happy customer
title: Shipped very fast

author: Whitney
text: At first I was on edge about ordering and was scared I was going to get ripped off. But once I got my order I was happy! Didn't take long at all.
title: At first I was on edge about ordering…

author: Ashley
text: Exactly what I ordered! Received my items fast being as though it had to be shipped to the stock x warehouse before being shipped to me
title: Exactly what I ordered

author: Port Coquitlam
text: The sneakers I ordered did not pass your inspection.  I received a quick refund.  Thanks so much for saving me considerable trouble in returning the product!
title: The sneakers I ordered did not pass…

author: Dashia
text: I placed my order took almost 2 weeks to finally see a tracking for DHL to require signature &  forged my signature. I don’t know who to contact for my kid shoes bc DHL doesn’t have customer service number and neither does StockX.
title: I placed my order took almost 2 weeks…

author: Juan
text:
Nice app
Very usefull app to buy this shoes
title: Nice app

author: James
text: Quick and Efficient
title: Quick and Efficient

author: Zachary Jones
text: Got my ps5 alot quicker than expected and I'm glad they actually verified it, no this ain't a fake review lmao, price sucks but it's a legit ps5 and I got what I wanted so hey if u need one this is the place to go.
title: Got my ps5 alot quicker than expected…

author: David
text: Apart from 2 failed purchases, once seller finally sent was a great process
title: Great in the end
